body_html:
@annarev many thanks! Yes, I'd like to hide ApplyAdaMax at first. By the way, where can I find the document about api_def_*.pbtxt?

If we hide the op, so we should call it by training_ops._apply_ada_max on python side, right?

body:
@annarev many thanks! Yes, I'd like to hide `ApplyAdaMax` at first. By the way, where  can I find the document about api_def_*.pbtxt?

If we hide the op, so we should call it by `training_ops._apply_ada_max` on python side, right?
